### Government Tender Announcement: Occupational Health & Safety Assessment Services

#### Tender Invitation
The House of Commons (HoC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for Occupational Health & Safety Assessment Services.

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Title**: Occupational Health & Safety Assessment Services
* **Tender Reference**: cb-563-38525586
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Tender Category**: SRV
* **Tender Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Tender Requirements
The House of Commons requires suppliers to assess and evaluate health and safety risks within the Parliament building.

#### Tender Documents
The tender notice and solicitation documents are available on MERX (https://www.merx.com) with no costs associated with previewing the documents.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please address them to:
	* **Name**: Chris Murray
	* **Email**: contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
	* **Phone**: (613) 996-2214
	* **Country**: Canada
	* **Address**: 50 O'Connor Street - 15th Floor, Ottawa, ON K1A1K3

**Important:**
The HoC is not responsible for any tender notices and/or related documents and attachments not accessed directly through MERX.

**Service Details:**
* **UNSPSC**: Risk or hazard assessment (77101501)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2025-01-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2029-12-31
